summary:
Loadscreen & Main Menu Replacer (200 new HD Loading screens)

contains ADULT content/ nudity
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/rbLm99q.jpg[/img]

[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][b][color=#ff00ff]/[/color][color=#00ffff]/[/color][color=#ffff00]/[/color][i][color=#00ffff][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/16915?tab=description]SSE PORT[/url]﻿[/color][/i][/b][/size][b][i][color=#ffff00][size=6]<[/size][/color][/i][/b][color=#00ffff][size=6][b][i]<[/i][/b][/size][/color][size=6][b][i][color=#ff00ff]<
[/color][/i][/b][/size][/font][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6][b][i]i[/i][color=#ff00ff]Luv[/color][i]Loading[/i][/b][/size][size=5]
[/size]
[list]
[*][size=3]it's a simple Loadscreen and Main Menu replacer[/size]
[*][size=3]included are 200 new 1080p Loading Screens and a new Main Menu.[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][list]
[*][b][size=3]the Loadingscreens are no Ingame Sreenshots. They are not even from Skyrim. [/size][/b]
[*][b][size=3]So you probably won't be able to get the armor etc.[/size][/b]
[/list][size=3]
[b][color=#ff00ff]//[/color]Install
[/b]
[/size][list]
[*][size=3]Download with NMM and Activate[/size]
[*][size=3]or[/size]
[*][size=3]Download manually and extract the [color=#ff7700]Data[/color] folder into your Skyrim Main file (e.g. C:\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim), overwrite when prompted[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size]
